name: Лак для волос Taft Три погоды Объем очень сильная фиксация 225мл
ingredients: Dimethyl Ether, Alcohol denat. (26,3 % Vol.), Aqua, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Panthenol, Benzophenone-4, Tocopheryl Acetate, AMPD-Isostearoyl Hydrolyzed Collagen, Parfum, Isopropyl Myristate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Limonene, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol.
